languages.text: "Я прибыл на Райкад Минорис с заданием, выполнению которого помешало восстание. Губернатор убежден, что бунт подняла недовольная чернь, однако с самого начала я подозревал, что у истоков находится некто более опасный. Мой визит в монастырь и несколько неторопливых бесед с причастными к восстанию..." {n}Хейнрикс бросает взгляд на труп у своих ног.{/n} "...подтвердили мои опасения".

traits.locale_text: "Я прибыл на Райкад с заданием, выполнению которого помешало восстание. Губернатор убежден, что бунт подняла недовольная чернь, однако с самого начала я подозревал, что у истоков находятся некто более опасный. Мой визит в монастырь и несколько неторопливых бесед с причастными к восстанию..." {n}Хейнрикс бросает взгляд на труп у своих ног.{/n} "...подтвердили мои опасения".

languages.text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."
languages.original_text: "Я прибыл на Райкад Минорис с заданием, выполнению которого помешало восстание. Губернатор убежден, что бунт подняла недовольная чернь, однако с самого начала я подозревал, что у истоков находится некто более опасный. Мой визит в монастырь и несколько неторопливых бесед с причастными к восстанию..." {n}Хейнрикс бросает взгляд на труп у своих ног.{/n} "...подтвердили мои опасения".

traits.locale_text: "I arrived at Rykad Minoris with a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble had been the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a series of slow, thoughtful conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

"I arrived at Rykad Minoris with a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble had been the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a series of slow, thoughtful conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

"I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

languages.text: “我之前来小莱卡德执行任务，但这里发生了叛乱，让我无法完成任务。这里的总督认为，是有些心怀不满的人煽动了那些乌合之众冲击政府，导致发生了这样的事情。但我马上起了疑心，我怀疑叛乱的根源是某些更加邪恶的东西。于是我造访了修道院，和一部分叛乱分子进行了推心置腹的交谈——”{n}海因里希瞥了一眼他脚下的尸体。{/n}“——也证实了我的猜测。”
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

traits.locale_text: “我之前来小莱卡德执行任务，但这里发生了叛乱，让我无法完成任务。这里的总督认为，是有些心怀不满的人煽动了那些乌合之众冲击政府，导致发生了这样的事情。但我马上起了疑心，我怀疑叛乱的根源是某些更加邪恶的东西。于是我造访了修道院，和一部分叛乱分子进行了推心置腹的交谈——”{n}海因里希瞥了一眼他脚下的尸体。{/n}“——也证实了我的猜测。”

languages.text: 「我はある任務を帯びてライカド・ミノリスに来たのですが、反乱によって果たせませんでした。総督は民衆の不満分子が発端だと確信していますが、我はすぐに反乱の根底にもっと邪悪な存在があるのではと思ったのです。そして修道院を訪れ、何人かの反乱軍と話をしたところ…」{n}ハインリックスは足元の死体に目をやった。{/n}「…我の疑念は確信に変わりました」
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

traits.locale_text: 「私はある任務を帯びてライカド・ミノリスに来たが、反乱によって果たせなかった。総督は民衆の不満分子が発端だと確信しているが、私はすぐに反乱の根底にもっと邪悪な存在があるのではと思ったのだ。そして修道院を訪れ、何人かの反乱軍と話をしたところ…」{n}ハインリックスは足元の死体に目をやった。{/n}「…私の疑念は確信に変わったのだ」

languages.text: "Ich verfolge eine Mission auf Rykad Minoris, an deren Abschluss mich eine Rebellion gehindert hat. Der Gouverneur ist überzeugt, dass Querulanten aus dem Pöbel die Anstifter waren, aber ich habe umgehend eine üblere Präsenz an der Wurzel der Meuterei vermutet. Mein Besuch im Kloster sowie entspannte Gespräche mit einigen Rebellen ..." {n}Heinrix wirft einen Blick auf die Leiche zu seinen Füßen.{/n} "... haben meinen Verdacht bestätigt."
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verfolge eine Mission auf Rykad Minoris, an deren Abschluss mich eine Rebellion gehindert hat. Der Gouverneur ist überzeugt, dass Querulanten aus dem Pöbel die Anstifter waren, aber ich habe umgehend eine üblere Präsenz an der Wurzel der Meuterei vermutet. Mein Besuch im Kloster sowie entspannte Gespräche mit einigen Rebellen ..." {n}Heinrix wirft einen Blick auf die Leiche zu seinen Füßen.{/n} "... haben meinen Verdacht bestätigt."

languages.text: « J'ai débarqué sur Rykad Minoris avec une mission bien précise, qu'une rébellion m'a empêché de mener à bien. Le gouverneur est convaincu que les instigateurs se cachent parmi la populace mécontente, mais j'ai immédiatement suspecté une influence bien plus sinistre d'être à l'origine de la mutinerie. Ma visite au monastère et quelques conversations enrichissantes avec certains rebelles... » {n}Heinrix jette un œil au cadavre à ses pieds.{/n} « ... ont confirmé mes soupçons. »
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai débarqué sur Rykad Minoris avec une mission bien précise, qu'une rébellion m'a empêché de mener à bien. Le gouverneur est convaincu que les instigateurs se cachent parmi la populace mécontente, mais j'ai immédiatement suspecté une influence bien plus sinistre d'être à l'origine de la mutinerie. Ma visite au monastère et quelques conversations enrichissantes avec certains rebelles... » {n}Heinrix jette un œil au cadavre à ses pieds.{/n} « ... ont confirmé mes soupçons. »

languages.text: «He venido a Rykad Minoris con una misión que la rebelión me ha impedido cumplir. El gobernador está convencido de que los más descontentos de entre la plebe eran los culpables, pero yo sospeché de inmediato la presencia de algo más siniestro en el corazón del amotinamiento. Mi visita al monasterio y unas conversaciones sin prisa con algunos de los rebeldes...». {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada al cadáver a sus pies.{/n} «... confirmaron mis sospechas».
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

traits.locale_text: «He venido a Rykad Minoris con una misión que la rebelión me ha impedido cumplir. Mi visita al monasterio y unas conversaciones sin prisa con algunos de los rebeldes...» {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada al cadáver a sus pies.{/n} «... confirmaron mis sospechas».

languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."

languages.text: "Rykad Minoris'e görev icabı geldim ama isyandan dolayı vazifem sekteye uğradı. Vali, fitnecilerin hoşnutsuz ayaktakımı olduğuna kanaat getirmiş durumda. Lakin ben, isyanın kökeninde daha uğursuz emeller yattığından şüphelendim. Manastıra ziyaretim ve bazı isyancılarla yaptığım uzun uzadıya konuşmalar...{n}" Heinrix, ayaklarının dibindeki cesede bakıyor.{/n} "Şüphelerimi doğruladı."
languages.original_text: "I came to Rykad Minoris on a mission, which a rebellion prevented me from fulfilling. The governor is convinced that malcontents from among the rabble were the instigators, but I immediately suspected a more sinister presence at the root of the mutiny. My visit to the monastery and a few unhurried conversations with some of the rebels—" {n}Heinrix glances at the dead body at his feet.{/n} "—confirmed my suspicions."
